input_type.script:
#!/usr/bin/python
''' Open JDK Version Extension Attribute '''
import subprocess import plistlib
def get_jdk_version(): """Returns the latest installed jdk11 version""" jdk_home_output = "/usr/libexec/java_home -X -v 11.*" jvm_vendor = "AdoptOpenJDK"
process = subprocess.check_output(jdk_home_output.split())
jdk_version_plist = plistlib.readPlistFromString(process)
i = 0 while i < len(jdk_version_plist): if jdk_version_plist[i]["JVMVendor"] == jvm_vendor: jdk_version = jdk_version_plist[i]["JVMVersion"] break i += 1
try: jdk_version except NameError: jdk_version = ""
return jdk_version
jdk_version = get_jdk_version() if not jdk_version: jdk_version = "" print "<result>{}</result>".format(jdk_version)
